{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-2680 |revision=A1 |series=AC2600 |price=250 |est_release_date=01/08/2018 |fcc_date=05/04/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117I |manuf_rev=AC44-DK |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR2680A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR2680A1 |pcb_id=141911720067J |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel (Lantiq) |cpu1_model=PXB4395EL;PXB4395EL1600, S7373N11, SLMD9; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=UniIC |ram1_model=HXB13H4G160AF-13KT |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Intel (Lantiq) |wi1_chip1_model=PSB83524M;PSB83524M, S7354L26, SLLQJ; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Intel (Lantiq) |wi2_chip1_model=PSB83514M;PSB83514MV12, S7014L23, SLLVP; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN/BT FEM;Skyworks;SKY85310-21;SKY21, 85310, 706LT;4; ,,, 5GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85729-11;SKY, 729, 2H00F;4; ,,, TPM;STMicroelectronics;ST33TPHF2ESPI;P68HAHB3, 7BA7A VQ, PHL 721, ST;1;;VQFN32; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, TPM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|D-Fend AC2600 Wi-Fi Router Powered by McAfee}} :[https://us.dlink.com/en/products/dir-2680-ac2600-wi-fi-router-powered-by-mcafee/ Product page] {{•}} [http://us.dlink.com/press-centre/press-releases/router-powered-by-mcafee/ Press release] "P/N:141911720067J R0B1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Arcadyan]] WG9117I AC44-DK (146000168700J R01) [https://fccid.io/KA2IR2680A1/Label/Label-Sample-3837467 Label] *[[D-Link DIR-2680]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router Powered by McAfee'' :CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] PXB4395EL (GRX350); WLAN: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] WAV500 {{see also|ASUS Blue Cave|Humax Quantum T9|Phicomm K3C}} ===Overview=== *AC2600 Wi-Fi with MU-MIMO *Gigabit ports (1x WAN, 4x LAN) *Intel GRX350 Network Processor *Cutting-Edge Chip Technology *Comprehensive parental controls *McAfee Secure Home Platform (SHP) *Downloadable antivirus software for devices *Protects all connected devices, including IoT devices *Cloud-based machine learning helps detect threats ===Announced at CES 2018=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33171-d-link-announces-new-wi-fi-systems-routers-and-cameras-at-ces-2018 ''D-Link Announces New Wi-Fi Systems and Routers'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://betanews.com/2018/01/08/dlink-dir2680-wifi-router-mcafee-intel/ ''D-Link DIR-2680 Wi-Fi Router'' on '''BetaNews'''] *[https://www.ithome.com.tw/review/120871 ''D-Link DIR-2680 Wi-Fi Router'' on '''ITHome'''] (CN) ===See also=== *[[D-Link DAP-2680 rev A1|D-Link DAP-2680]] - ''AC1750 Wireless Dual-Band PoE Access Point'' :FCC ID: KA2AP2680A1 (2018-02-27), QCA (Alpha Networks), 12V/2A *[[D-Link COVR-C1203]] - ''AC1200 Dual-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :WLAN: 2x3 2.4/5GHz, MU-MIMO, Smart Roaming, $250 (Q1 2018) [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2017/33052-d-link-ces-2017-announcements PR] *[[D-Link COVR-2202]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :WLAN: 2x2 2.4/5GHz, 2x2 5GHz (backhaul), Alexa, $320 (Q2 2018) *[[D-Link DIR-X6060]] - ''AX6000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' (Q3 2018) :802.11ax 4x4 MU-MIMO, maximum link rates of 6 Gbps :1x 2.5GbE WAN port, 4x GbE LAN ports, USB 3.0 port *[[D-Link DIR-X9000]] - ''AX11000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' (Q3 2018) :802.11ax 4x4 MU-MIMO, maximum link rates of 11 Gbps :1x 2.5GbE WAN port, 4x GbE LAN ports, USB 3.0 port :8x high-performance antennas, DLNA, D-Link Wi-Fi App __NOTOC__
